name: Obstruction : VR
description: An interactive Puzzle Game, where you control a little white cube through a journey of obstructions that blocking your way to the final secret! Hold your hand steady and thread the gaps towards your goal!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Gtx 1060 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Gtx 1060 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset
